definition: variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: Among the particles predicted to appear during this cooling are strange quarks.
sentences.chinese: 预计在冷却过程中出现的粒子将是奇异夸克。

sentences.english: In Chapter 5 we investigate the multi-quark states.
sentences.chinese: 第五章我们处理多夸克态。

sentences.english: The chiral symmetry spontaneous breaking can be characterized by the quark condensates .
sentences.chinese: 手征对称自发破缺的特征可以用夸克凝聚表示出来。

sentences.english: It is studied Baryon excited states for quark confinement and chiral symmetry breaking.
sentences.chinese: 研究了夸克约束的重子受激态和手征对称破缺。

sentences.english: No they will not, because the amount of antiquarks are really small, not equal with quarks.
sentences.chinese: 不会的，因为反夸克的数量远少于夸克。

sentences.english: No they will not, because the amount of antiquarks are really small, not equal with quarks.
sentences.chinese: 不会的，因为反夸克的数量远少于夸克。

sentences.english: Perhaps partons or quarks will be found with this accelerator.
sentences.chinese: 很有可能，用这台加速器就能够找到部分子或夸克。

sentences.english: Shockers drop a single Quark Bomb.
A Dominator flanked by two Quarks.
This thesis focuses on the study of a new framework of heavy quark effective field theory .
sentences.chinese: 本文致力于研究一种新的重夸克有效场论。

sentences.english: Classifications of hadrons, unitarity symmetries of hadron, quark model.
sentences.chinese: 强子分类，强子的么正对称性，夸克模型。

sentences.english: In this thesis we study the nuclear matter using the quark-meson coupling model (QMC).
sentences.chinese: 本文用夸克介子耦合模型研究核物质。

sentences.english: In standard model, hadrons is made up of quarks and anti-quarks.
sentences.chinese: 在标准模型中，强子是由夸克构成的。

sentences.english: When quarks are resting, antiquarks are set free from our bodies, they can go anywhere they want to.
sentences.chinese: 当夸克休息的时候，反夸克就从身体中被释放了出来。

sentences.english: When quarks are resting, antiquarks are set free from our bodies, they can go anywhere they want to.
sentences.chinese: 当夸克休息的时候，反夸克就从身体中被释放了出来。
